display_long_description:
Would you like to sit with Albert Einstein as he tells you what inspired him, at age four, to want to discover revolutionary theories of the universe? Do you want to meet Kleopatra, Queen of the Nile, whose story was told only by her enemies, the Romans? Do you wonder how Mozart found inspiration for his masterpieces? Immersed in VR Guest, he will tell you himself.

Intended for the naturally curious, VR Guest invites you into the virtual world to dine with these three giants of history. Enjoy the fascinating conversation as their personal stories evolve. Ask questions. Explore their minds. Dessert will be a desire to unearth the unknown.

Kleopatra, Mozart and Einstein encourage you to realize there is so much more to this world than meets the eye. VR Guest is the Time Machine you’ve been waiting for; bon appetit for your imagination!
